entry.title: 294 - Divisors
entry.content:
``` c

include<stdio.h>

include<stdlib.h>

include<math.h>

include <memory.h>

/Divisors / int main() {

int sample,lower,upper;
int i,j,k,s;
int m,max,maxnum,divisor,prime;
char is_prime[31623];
memset(is_prime,1,31623);
for(i=2;i<31623;i++){
    if(is_prime[i]==1){
        for(k=i*2;k<31623;k=k+i){
            is_prime[k]=0;
        }
    }
}
freopen("294.in","r",stdin);
scanf("%d",&sample);
for(i=0;i<sample;i++){
    scanf("%d%d",&lower,&upper);
    printf("Between %d and %d, ",lower,upper);
    m = (int)(sqrt(upper)+0.001);
    max = 1;
    maxnum = lower;
    for(s=lower;s<=upper;s++){
        int tmp = s;
        divisor = 1;
        for(j=2;j<=m&&tmp>1;j++){
            if((is_prime[j]==1)&&(tmp%j==0)){
                prime = 0;
                while(tmp%j==0){
                    prime++;
                    tmp = tmp / j;
                }
                divisor = divisor * (prime + 1);
            }
        }
        if(tmp > 1)
            divisor = divisor *2;
        if(divisor > max){
            max = divisor;
            maxnum = s;
        }
    }
    printf("%d has a maximum of %d divisors.\n",maxnum,max);
}
return 0;

} ```
